page_content: The page provides an overview of the 2023 conference on digital archiving and its themes.
The page discusses the financial planning of the Canton of St. Gallen for the years 2022 and beyond.
The page provides information on inheritance and gift taxes, including forms and tax calculators.
The page provides comprehensive guidance on what to do after receiving a termination notice, including registering with the RAV, job search requirements, and unemployment benefits.
The page outlines the procedures and forms for inventory and division of inheritance for tax purposes.
The page contains conference materials on digital archiving, including PDFs discussing digital systems and document management.
The page provides guidelines and resources for record-keeping and archiving, including the use of OneGov GEVER software.
